attributes.action: allow motorbike rallies throughout England to go ahead and stop the police discriminating against bikers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bikers and public are discriminated against everytime the police decide to shut down more and more bike shows and rallies thus showing the police wish to eradicate bikes in the UK altogether,even though EU bikers can ride happily around and hold rallies,shows and anything else bike related.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
